name: The Stanley transformable
description:
This is the story about a human named Stanley. However, will he still be human by the end of it? Only one person can tell, and that is the handsome narrator who will lead him through this epic!

No player can get in between the story of this magnificent weaver of tales and certainly not by clicking blue words in a green void!

A straightforward story with absolutely one ending and no one getting in between this outcome! Transformation? In MY story? I don't know what you're talking about!

...

Is he gone? Can I finally get a say in here?

I think he is, good. Thank you for your interest in the Stanley transformable! This is a text adventure all about coming out differently from a situation while battling the narrative of an omniscient narrator! At the moment there are eight endings, but more are underway!
The game should work on both computers and smart devices, so don't feel afraid to explore! This is my first time publicly posting a text adventure, so I would love to hear your feedback!

Oh yeah one last thing! You can check out more of my writing over on my furaffinity account!

Wait, I think a bipedal wolf just walked in here and addressed the reader! I can't have that, that's a fourth wall break! It would ruin the immersion of the reader! Shoo you meddling canine! This is my story, and no one will get in between!
